item.title: Decoding Brain Patterns for Predicting Heart Disease Risk Markers
item.description:
• Delivered brain phenotype for peripheral blood pressure reactivity. [Github]

  • Developed PCA-LASSO toolbox to predict cardiovascular risk based on brain activity.

  • Co-authored top-tier journal article which received media coverage. Reuters

Techniques: Matlab, FSL, Freesurfer, gnu parallel, SPSS, mediation, PCA, LASSO

item.title: Utilizing Machine Learning for Brain Functional Connectivity Analysis
item.description:
• Created Predictive flow algorithm: discovers the relationship between brain regions based on their temporal sequences of activation using machine learning. [Github]

  • Analyzed one of the largest datasets for brain neuroimaging: 800+ participants, 220 temporal scans, 200K data point per scan (~ 1 TB)

Techniques: Matlab, Python, R, Jupyter, L1 regularized regression (LASSO)
